external_games.name: Racing: 4 Games on One Game Pak

name: Racing: 4 Games on One Game Pak
summary:
Racing: 4 Games on One Game Pak is a compilation of games developed by MTO and published by THQ for Game Boy Advance.

The game contains four full racing games on a single cartridge. There is a menu that allows players to choose which game to play. The four games included on the cartridge are:

GT Advance Championship Racing
GT Advance 2: Rally Racing
GT Advance 3: Pro Concept Racing
Moto GP: Ultimate Racing Technology
